『My Little Puppy』無料体験版が配信開始。死んだコーギーを操作、天国で飼い主と再会するために冒険するアドベンチャーゲーム | ゲーム・エ

item.title: Why I'm No Longer Talking to Architects About Microservices
item.description: Check out our Cloud Native Services and book a call with one of our experts today! It happened again last week. I was at an architecture review meeting when a fellow architect eagerly started another debate about *microservices*.
